entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having narrowed eyes and bushy hair that seems to crackle with electricity. She is also mentioned as being angry and threatening George and Fred.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as being horrified by Hermione's threat and takes a step back from her.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as looking thunderstruck at Hermione's threat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being low in his seat with his nose roughly level with his knees.

relationships.description: Hermione threatens George, saying she will write to his mother.
Hermione also threatens Fred, saying they are not giving Fancies to first years.
